amendment.description: With respect to the treatment of certain American prisoners of war.

vote.text: Amendment SA 528 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 528 proposed by Senator Lieberman. (consideration: CR S5048; text: CR S5048) With respect to the treatment of certain American prisoners of war.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 528 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
